summary: Un nuovo sguardo al costume di Captain Marvel nel nuovo backstage
title: Un nuovo sguardo al costume di Captain Marvel nel nuovo backstage
body:
Un nuovo sguardo al costume di Captain Marvel nel nuovo backstage

Marvel Studios e Entertainment Tonight hanno rilasciato oggi un nuovo dietro le quinte da Captain Marvel, il cinecomic presentato solo qualche giorno prima attraverso il rilascio del teaser trailer.

Nel video di ET viene dato spazio ai dettagli relativi al costume (o uno dei tanti) della nota supereroina nel film Marvel. A presentare il tutto, la protagonista Brie Larson.

Il Teaser Trailer

View On WordPress

blog.description: I just want to talk about geeky things. Marvel, DC I love both and other things. From Montreal, Canada (English is not my first language)You can ask me anything.

summary: When you stop and look for a minute, Kevin Feige and the crew involve with Avengers 4 never disclosed anything on Captain...
body:
Captain Marvel WILL NOT defeat Thanos

When you stop and look for a minute, Kevin Feige and the crew involve with Avengers 4 never disclosed anything on Captain Marvel’s involvement in the movie. Everything we know is that she will play an important part, but nothing else. 

Theories that she will defeat Thanos are mostly that theories and nothing official.

But we can make somethings clear only by looking at the Avnegers leak concept art

Look where CM is compared to the other characters, in the far back. The one in the front are Captain America and Iron Man. (Maybe concept art are not relative with the actual movie, but still let me explain).

The Russo Brothers already said Captain America will play a much bigger role in this movie, probably because it will be the actor’s last movie (trying not to cry). I don’t think that they will make Captain Marvel steal the spotlight and defeating the villain all by herself. 

IT SIMPLE, THIS MOVIE IS NOT ABOUT HER. 

This movie will be about the OG Avengers (and others), Captain America and Iron Man will have to reconcile and go together for a last stand-in the ultimate battle.

I’m expecting CM to play a much smaller part, like supporting character. Sure she will trade blows with Thanos, but at the end of the day, it will be the OG Avengers that will defeat him.

It will honestly be stupid if they pulled a Justice League and the other heroes can’t do shit until another character arrive and save the day. They already showed that they don’t need her that much. They just need and extra power since it’s been reduced greatly.

I have faith in writers since they are the ones wrote the screenplay for CA: Civil War and that movie introduced 2 new characters whitout overshadowing the main ones.

AND I'M JUST IMAGINE IF YOU WERE CAROL DANVERS
But also imagine if like... Carol Danvers was so tall she could just pick Thor up with ease
summary: I’m very sad that Brie Larson is 5′7... probably the most average height possible. Like imagine if Carol Danvers was tall!...
body:
I’m very sad that Brie Larson is 5′7… probably the most average height possible.

Like imagine if Carol Danvers was tall! Towered over all the Avengers. A++ be still my beating heart.

But also… imagine if she was SMOL! Tiny smol firecracker of power. People keep forgetting she’s smol because she emanates such power. They forget that they don’t need to look up to see her.

summary:
“Carol Danvers could be a lesbian,” I say into the mic.
The crowd boos and jeers. Dejected, I’m about to make my way off the...
body:
“Carol Danvers could be a lesbian,” I say into the mic.

The crowd boos and jeers. Dejected, I’m about to make my way off the stage, when a voice speaks up from the back of the room, commanding silence.

“She’s right.” It’s Brie Larson.

reblog.comment:

The crowd boos and jeers. Dejected, I’m about to make my way off the stage, when a voice speaks up from the back of the room, commanding silence.

“She’s right.” It’s Brie Larson.

trail.content_raw:
“Carol Danvers could be a lesbian,” I say into the mic.

The crowd boos and jeers. Dejected, I’m about to make my way off the stage, when a voice speaks up from the back of the room, commanding silence.

“She’s right.” It’s Brie Larson.
trail.content:
“Carol Danvers could be a lesbian,” I say into the mic.

The crowd boos and jeers. Dejected, I’m about to make my way off the stage, when a voice speaks up from the back of the room, commanding silence.

“She’s right.” It’s Brie Larson.

summary: “It’s hard to explain. I keep having these…memories. I see flashes. I think I had a life here. But I can’t tell if it’s real....
caption:
“It’s hard to explain. I keep having these…memories. I see flashes. I think I had a life here. But I can’t tell if it’s real. I’m not what you think I am.”

Captain Marvel (2019)
